item.description:
New England Boston Search Engine Optimization Group meets the first monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England to join us.

We also invite local Boston business owners to be our guest website's to be reviewed.


Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend.


Agenda:

6:45pm to 7pm: Get Your Food/Drinks and Network

7pm: Business Card Bowl: drop you card in and we will try to make copies for all that attend, before the end of the event.

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Share something personaly that most people wouldn't know about you? The Theme of stories for tonight is something wacky that you did as a kid growing up?
* Share your networking goals with the group

7:45 to 8pm:

Guest Speaker:

John Cass

Topic: How to run an effective corporate blog.


8:00 to 8:15pm: Best Websites & Tools: Share your urls & Whats Working? Group Discussion to share success stories of what else is working?

8:15 to 8:30pm: Share Your SEO Tips: Please post within your rsvp your url and then please take the time to review other sites listed prior to the meeting and write out your seo tips to exchange with fellow members.

8:30 to 8:45pm: Open Roundtable Challenge Discussion: Please be specific about your challenges in your business or website. 3 to 5 min max spent on any one business model.

8:45 to 9:00 pm: Stand up and network or go home


We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

New England Boston Search Engine Optimization Group

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: New England Boston Search Engine Optimization Group
